  Define the task to achieve, including specific requirements, constraints, and success criteria.


  In this project use the react-hot-toast library for notifications. Ensure that notifications are user-friendly and enhance the overall user experience.
  and always show when user click on the api call buttons like "Save", "Submit", "Delete", etc.

  Always use the axios instance from the @/api/axiosInstance file for making API calls. This ensures consistency in handling requests, responses, and errors across the application.

  And use the token from the local storage for authentication headers in all API requests. This is crucial for maintaining secure communication with the backend services.

  Ensure that all components and modules adhere to best practices in React development, including proper state management, component lifecycle methods, and performance optimization techniques.

  and use the same project theme when create a new user interface or component.

  when calling the api and than getting the response then response data in the response object. like response.data and match the colums name and response data for integrate with the ui components.

  Write API call in proper formate with varaible endpoint and payload.
  baes on the current project structure and coding standards.
